contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=February 2009}} '''Xunwu County''' ([[Chinese character|Chinese]]: 寻乌县) is a [[County (People's Republic of China)|county]], under the jurisdiction of [[Ganzhou]], in [[Jiangxi]] province, [[People's Republic of China]]. It was the focus of [[Mao Zedong]]'s 1930 essay ''Report from Xunwu'' which surveyed conditions in the region and related them to Mao's developing theory of Chinese communism.<ref>{{cite book|title=Report from Xunwu|year=1993|publisher=Stanford University Press|location=Stanford University|isbn=978-0-8047-2182-0}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{coord|24.9542|N|115.662|E|source:kolossus-zhwiki|display=title}} {{County-level divisions of Jiangxi}} [[Category:Ganzhou]] [[Category:County-level divisions of Jiangxi]] {{Jiangxi-geo-stub}}
